alert.note: Alert for Lucas; Ottawa; Sandusky; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 19 at 5:08PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Ottawa, western Sandusky, eastern Wood and northeastern Lucas Counties through 545 PM EST... At 506 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near Elmore and Bowling Green moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bowling Green, Oregon, North Baltimore, Oak Harbor, Gibsonburg, Genoa, Woodville, Elmore, Pemberville, Millbury, Luckey, Bradner, Wayne, Risingsun, Cygnet, Lindsey, Portage, Jerry City, Rocky Ridge and Clay Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EST for northwestern Ohio.
